strapiPost.title: Naturals Begin 2023 Season This Thursday At Arvest Ballpark
strapiPost.content:
Looking for a fun family outing this week? The Northwest Arkansas Naturals open the 2023 season with a three-game series against the Midland RockHounds at Arvest Ballpark from Apr 6-8 and will host post-game firework shows on Thursday and Friday and a Naturals cap giveaway on Saturday night.

  • For the kids: The KC Royals Kids Zone has new inflatables, including a 28-ft-long double dip slide and a giant castle bouncer with an obstacle course inside.
  • Fun for fans: Join between-inning entertainment like the Trike Race, Inner Tube Race, and Fly Ball Frenzy, and mark your calendars for this season's theme nights like Star Wars Night, Jun 2, and Marvel's Defenders of the Diamond Night, Jun 17.

Find a complete list of theme nights and other exciting updates at Arvest Ballpark HERE.
